clinical_study.brief_title: Lung Ultrasound in Diagnosis and Management of Bronchiolitis Bronchiolitis
clinical_study.official_title: Lung Ultrasound: a Useful Tool in Diagnosis and Management of Bronchiolitis?

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the correlation between clinical and ultrasound findings in children presented with signs suggestive of bronchiolitis and to validate an ultrasound score for bronchiolitis that will correlate with specific clinical outcomes.

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the correlation between clinical and ultrasound findings in children presented with signs suggestive of bronchiolitis

secondary_outcome.measure: ultrasound score for bronchiolitis and clinical outcome
secondary_outcome.description: to validate an ultrasound score for bronchiolitis that will correlate with specific clinical outcomes

arm_group.description: children presented with signs suggestive of bronchiolitis

study_pop.textblock: children presented with signs suggestive of bronchiolitis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- children presented with signs suggestive of bronchiolitis
Exclusion Criteria:
- other major pathology

reference.citation: Caiulo VA, Gargani L, Caiulo S, Fisicaro A, Moramarco F, Latini G, Picano E. Lung ultrasound in bronchiolitis: comparison with chest X-ray. Eur J Pediatr. 2011 Nov;170(11):1427-33. doi: 10.1007/s00431-011-1461-2. Epub 2011 Apr 6.
